title: detox aromatherapy oil - Chooice
description: There's nothing better than essential oils to detox gently. Thanks to the purifying, draining and detoxifying properties of these essential oils, aromatherapy is an effective solution to eliminate toxins and restore your body's energy. Detox from energy drinks, smoking, sugar and other addictions.
cleaned_text: Description There's nothing better than essential oils to detox gently. Thanks to the purifying, draining and detoxifying properties of these essential oils, aromatherapy is an effective solution to eliminate toxins and restore your body's energy. Detox from energy drinks, smoking, sugar and other addictions. Add 1 - 2 drops to our aromatherapy bracelet or 3 - 5 drops to your diffuser and breathe in the magic of essential oils. oils- 100% pure organic lemon and grapefruit oils with clear quartz crystals
